meta.content: Jeopardy Archive David Schuman Sophie Hill Erin Zwiener Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6442.

td.p: David Schuman, a communications and economics student originally from Ardsley, New York
Sophie Hill, a Navy analyst from Coronado, California
Erin Zwiener, a conservation journalist and pet-sitter from Abiquiu, New Mexico (whose 3-day cash winnings total $53,399)

tr.td: COMPOSERS' COUNTRY OF BIRTH
(Alex: We're talking about present-day countries now.)
WELCOME TO MY "FLAT"
TAX-ONOMY
SUCH A LITERARY CHARACTER!
IT'S ALL GREEK LETTERS TO ME
BILLBOARD'S TOP MONEY MAKERS OF 2011
